column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////Hi Khai - Thanks for the awesome review! I'm glad you are one of our "JINYA All-Stars" and have been able to get to know our servers by name. And above all
column2: I'm very pleased to know our quality has been consistent since your first visit. That might be the highest compliment we can receive! Thanks again
column4: for all your love and support.
